lead_paragraph: The United States market started out lower but regained some ground in part because of signs that consumer confidence was improving.
snippet: The United States market started out lower but regained some ground in part because of signs that consumer confidence was improving.

headline.seo: Wall Street Ends November With a Slide
headline.print_headline: Investor Pessimism Persists Over European Debt Crisis

byline.original: By CHRISTINE HAUSER and MATTHEW SALTMARSH
